rr.state
Class ShadowVolatile

java.lang.Object
  acme.util.decorations.Decoratable
      rr.state.ShadowVolatile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ShadowVolatile
extends Decoratable

The state associated with a volatile memory location. Tools should save information about volatiles as decorations on the ShadowVar object.

See Also:
